SELECT ART.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,ART.AR_RF_TRX_PK AS AR_RF_TRX_PK
,ART.AR_RF_CRAT_DT AS AR_RF_CRAT_DT ,ART.AP_VND_INV_NUM AS AP_VND_INV_NUM ,ART.AR_ADJ_NUM AS AR_ADJ_NUM --,AR.RCPT_NUM AS RCPT_NUM ,NVL(AR.RCPT_NUM, ACP.RCPT_NUM) AS RCPT_NUM
,CAIH.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM AS AP_PMT_CHK_NUM ,CAIH.ACCT_INV_STS_CD AS ACCT_INV_STS_CD
FROM AR_RF_TRX ART ,CM_AP_INV_HDR CAIH
,AR_RF_RQST_DTL ARRD ,AR_TRX_BAL ATB ,AR_RCPT AR ,AR_CASH_APP ACP
WHERE
ART.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ART.AR_RF_STS_CD = #stsCd#
AND CAIH.ACCT_INV_STS_CD != ART.ACCT_INV_STS_CD
AND ART.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ART.VND_CD = CAIH.AP_VND_CD AND ART.AP_VND_INV_NUM = CAIH.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND ART.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CAIH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND ART.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ARRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ART.AR_RF_RQST_DTL_PK = ARRD.AR_RF_RQST_DTL_PK AND ARRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ATB.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ARRD.AR_TRX_BAL_PK = ATB.AR_TRX_BAL_PK AND ATB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND ATB.AR_TRX_NUM = AR.RCPT_NUM(+) AND ATB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ACP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND ATB.ATT_ADJ_NUM = ACP.AR_ADJ_NUM(+) AND ARRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ATB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND ACP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
ORDER BY ART.AR_RF_TRX_PK
